title: Idhu Kadhala Mudhal Kadhala Lyrics Thulluvadho Ilamai
stanzas: <div>Idhu Kadhala Mudhal Kadhala Lyrics Thulluvadho Ilamai

Idhu kadhala
mudhal kadhalaa
oru pennidam uruvaanatha
idhu nilaikkumaa
needikkumaa nenje

un paarvaiyil
un sparisathil
un vaasathil
un kobathil
idhayathai thaan abagarathaai
kaaranam sol penne

Idhu kadhala
mudhal kadhalaa
oru pennidam uruvaanatha
idhu nilaikkumaa
needikkumaa nenje

iravu thookkatham tholainthathe
oru vitha yaekkam vanthathe
en vazhakai indruthaa
un kaiyyile

pudhithaai en nenjukkul
paayum raththam
urangum pothu yedhetho
ularal saththam

ada kanavukkule kannadi
kolaigal yutham
en kavithai kirukirkellaame
neethaan artham

Idhu kadhala
mudhal kadhalaa
indha vayathile
varum maatramaa
kuzhambugiren
pulambugiren unnaale
unnaale unnaale unnaale

enna pesinen
enna ninaikkiren
engu pogiren
edhu seigiren
puriyavillai theriyavillai
pudhai manalaai ponaaye

ini vasantham yaethadi
vazhve varutham thaanadi
kaatril alainthu naan thirigiren

pudhithaai en nenjukkul
paayum raththam
urangum pothu yedhetho
ularal saththam

ada kanavukkule kannadi
kolaigal yutham
en kavithai kirukirkellaame
neethaan artham

pudhithaai en nenjukkul
paayum raththam
urangum pothu yedhetho
ularal saththam

ada kanavukkule kannadi
kolaigal yutham
en kavithai kirukirkellaame
neethaan artham
